signature: public <E> Double apply(final SimilarityInput<E> left, final SimilarityInput<E> right)
name: apply
javadoc:
/**
 * Calculates the similarity between two sets of elements.
 *
 * This method applies the Jaccard Similarity formula to the input sets and returns a value between 0.0 (completely dissimilar) and 1.0 (identical).
 *
 * @param left The first set of elements.
 * @param right The second set of elements.
 * @return A double value representing the similarity between the two sets, where higher values indicate greater similarity.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Calculates the similarity between two sets of elements using the Jaccard Similarity formula.
 *
 * The Jaccard Similarity is defined as the size of their intersection divided by the size of their union. This value ranges from 0.0 (completely dissimilar) to 1.0 (identical).
 *
 * @param left The first set of elements, which must not be null.
 * @param right The second set of elements, which must not be null.
 * @return A double value representing the similarity between the two sets, where higher values indicate greater similarity.
 * @throws NullPointerException if either the left or right parameter is null
 */
